title: Your old phone is safe for longer than you think
description: Smartphone makers fix security flaws on your device for four to eight years or more, giving you comfort that you can hold onto your phone if you wish.

title: NASA’s Psyche spacecraft launches, beginning a first-of-its-kind mission
description: The Psyche mission will travel more than 2 billion miles to visit a space rock that may be a remnant of an ancient world’s core.

title: Microsoft buys Call of Duty maker Activision in a hotly contested deal
description: The deal, which was held up for months by antitrust regulators, is a major victory for Microsoft and the tech industry.

title: AI voice clones mimic politicians and celebrities, reshaping reality
description: Artificial intelligence voice cloning software has rapidly increased in quality. It’s allowing anyone from foreign actors to music fans to copy somebody’s voice.
